website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable bench option with a modern twist. Great balance of comfort and style.
pros: Large support legs keep the bench from sliding around hard surfaces
Great extra padding on the bench seat
cons: Not as modern as some more futuristic benches

customer_reviews.title: Decent little bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: I chose this bench because I wanted specific colors and style bench to add to my salon. It’s a very sturdy bench. I gave it 4 starts because I think for the price, the cushion should be better quality. It works great to seating for two, but not comfortable enough for sitting for long periods. But for less than $100, I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tori LenellTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Chic, comfy and very high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! I've had it for almost a year now at the main entrance of our house where we take off our shoes. It's sturdy, comfy, very modern and high quality looking. I also got the smaller ottoman to match and they both make our entrance and living room look chic and comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Alondra Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Bench
customer_reviews.text: I received my bench and upon assembling it, found that it appeared to be not so even. If I had not already torn down the box for recycling, I would have returned it. I loved the bench and color of the legs, but it did not fit together perfectly. The legs are apart by more space than there should be. Guess I have no choice but to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Sullenberger

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty
customer_reviews.text: This stool looks beautiful. It's lightweight and sturdy. The cushion part doesn't seem very usable, only decorative. Seems if I sit on it or stand on it (as I did to change a light bulb), it might bust at the seams, as the cushion inside is very rigid.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: we've been very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It is just what we wanted. Just a note, we have stained concrete floors and this slides all over the place. We had to put something on the bottom to prevent sliding. With that taken care of, we've been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bench
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bench and easy to assemble. I find it is easiest to loosely get all the bolts into their holes and then tighten. It allows for some give while getting each bolt aligned properly. It took me about 20 minutes to put it together. The bench is a nice quality and the stiching on the seat is nicely done. Great bench especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We love this. It works well to sit on to put on or remove shoes
customer_reviews.author: cheri mattern

customer_reviews.title: Decent bench
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, looks quite nice. Easy to assemble just 6 bolts tightened by included Allen wrench. Build quality is suspect as 1 bolt simply would not line up and I was forced to not use it.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Wish it didn't slide so easily on floor, but is very sturdy and nice colors
customer_reviews.author: Jill G

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and very easy to put together, no instructions needed. Very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Korah

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: It definitely did not want to come together, but after much swearing, and a little bit of patience, it finally did. Aesthetically very pleasing, but definitely a bit creaky. I’ll update the review as I continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jyles

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy bench and looks much more expensive then it is. Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Blayney

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bench and nice size too
customer_reviews.text: Good looking bench and nice size too. Pretty stable and easy to put together, though one of the predrilled holes didn't fully line up.
customer_reviews.author: arh

customer_reviews.title: Great for foot of bed
customer_reviews.text: Great for foot of bed. I gave it 4 instead of 5 because I think it might show wear & not hold up great if used lots. It fits our need great!
customer_reviews.author: SSS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, and I love the look however i had a small stain on the top of mine. Would have been 5 stars without the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is the perfect piece for our closet. Size was just right and it's very comfortable. It looks very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Ease of assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the end of our king bed - very sturdy and is durable enough for our cats...great quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: W.B

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great bench at a great price. Firm seat and modern look. Really love!
customer_reviews.author: Teresapicks

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid, sturdy, stable, bench. As some of the reviews stated, the cushion is very firm but it's a bench, not a sofa. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. The seat was attached but put on crocked. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Mary Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Good Look But Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bench BUT I could not get it level. It's like one side is longer than the other. Thankfully, I am not using it to sit on but more as an accent piece to look at.
customer_reviews.author: B. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench it’s slim and attractive, super easy to put together and not super MCM so it won’t go out of style.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good cushion and fabric color. Paint on legs looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

product_meta.title: Simpli Home Milltown 44 inch Wide Rectangle Large Ottoman Bench Grey Footrest Stool, Linen Look Polyester Fabric for Living Room, Bedroom, Contemporary Modern
product_meta.description: Size:44 inch| Color:GreyUpdate your living space with the Milltown Ottoman Bench. Its clean modern style will add a fresh look to your space. Made with durable, high quality Grey linen look fabric for a luxurious feel. This sleek ottoman features a narrow profile which is ideal for an entryway or at the end of a bed and is available in two sizes, making it suitable for just about any room in your home.; Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography; At Simpli Home we believe in creating excellent, high quality products made from the finest materials at an affordable price. Every one of our products come with a 1-year warranty and easy returns if you are not satisfied
feature_bullets: HAND CONSTRUCTED using solid wood, engineered woods and upholstered in a durable Ash Blonde Faux Leather
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL ottoman can be used in bedroom, living room, family room, hallway as an entryway bench, foot stool, accent furniture or provide additional sitting
Design features solid wood framed base, legs and comfortable cushioned seat
Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography

At Simpli Home we believe in creating excellent, high quality products made from the finest materials at an affordable price. Every one of our products come with a 1-year warranty and easy returns if you are not satisfied
